titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1660) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the incentives for the construction and renovation of public schools and to provide tax incentives for corporations to participate in cooperative agreements with public schools in distressed areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Rangel. Petition No: 106-5.

bill.summary: 7/1/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 1660 (public school modernization). Provides that if the Committee of the Whole rises and reports that it has come to no resolution on the bill, then on the next legislative day the House of Representatives shall, immediately after the third daily order of business, resolve into such Committee for further consideration of the bill.
